title: unnaippOl uLLam urugi aruLvOr
sahitya:
unnaippOl uLLam urugi aruLvOr illai cennimalai mEl uraiyum sEvarkkoDi mannavA


anupallavi

  panniru karangaLAl bhaktark-aruLai vAritannigharillAmal dArALamAi vazhangum


caraNam    innaluTru idayam iDindiDat-tuDittu tunbamuTru un tuNai tEDi vandavar 
unniru porppAdam tannaip-paTrinAl annArai AtkoNDu annaikk-iNaiyAga
